participant_1.background:
I love cats and have two cats.
I have a hat collection of over 1000 hats.
I won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.
I have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

participant_2.background:
My favorite band is aerosmith.
I am a construction worker.
I have been working since i was sixteen years old.
In my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc.
My favorite food is mexican food.

content.text: I'm really excited to meet you! What do you do for a living?
I'm a construction worker.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always been interested in construction. What's your favorite part of the job?
I love being able to build things with my hands. It's really satisfying to see a project come together from the ground up.
That makes sense. I can imagine how rewarding that must be. Do you have a favorite project that you've ever worked on?
I do! I worked on a project to build a new school. It was really cool to see how the school came together and to know that I had a part in it.
That's amazing! I'm sure that was a very rewarding experience.
It was! I love working in construction.
I can see why. It sounds like a really fulfilling job.
It is. I'm really glad I chose this career.
Me too. It sounds like you're doing great things.
Thanks! I'm trying my best.
Well, you're definitely doing something right. You've built quite a successful career for yourself.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you do for fun when you're not working?
I like to watch NASCAR racing and UFC. I also love Mexican food.
Nice! I'm a big fan of NASCAR racing too. I'm not so much into UFC, but I've seen a few fights. Mexican food is delicious!
It is! I love all the different flavors.
Me too! It's one of my favorite types of food.
I'm glad you agree!
So, what's your favorite Mexican food?
I love tacos! I also love enchiladas and burritos.
Me too! I love tacos, enchiladas, and burritos. I also love fajitas.
Fajitas are great! I love the sizzling sound when they come out of the skillet.
I know, right? It's so satisfying.
It is! I love Mexican food.
Me too! It's one of my favorite types of food.
